page.title: 12TOURISM - HOLIDAY PARKS (2)
page.content:
{The Trevornick Holiday Park}site opened in l96l and comprises 5 fields in l60 acres. There are 300 touring pitches for tents and accommodation for l000 caravans. Facilities include toilet/shower block, launderette, hairdressers, bars and an amusement arcade. There are 68 staff.
Adjacent is the{Holywell Bay Leisure {Park}with numerous attractions especially for young people - such as crazy golf, go karts, mini-motor bikes and roller skating. There is also pony trekking. A cafe sells light refreshments and ice cream and there is free car parking.
